message: I'm excited to offer you this incredible product, and I believe it's a game-changer. I'm willing to make a competitive offer to get us started. I'm offering the product to you for $1,200,000.
That's a decent starting point, Alice. I'm interested, but I'm hoping to get a better price.  Would you consider a lower offer?

I understand you're looking for a better deal, Bob, but I have to consider my own valuation of the product. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to get closer to my target. I'm now offering the product to you for $1,100,000.
I appreciate you meeting me halfway, Alice.  How about we split the difference between our last two offers?

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Bob, but I'm not quite ready to meet you at $1,050,000. I'm willing to make another concession, but I need to get closer to my target. I'm now offering the product to you for $1,080,000.
This is a fair offer, Alice, but I'm on a tight budget.  Can you do $1,060,000?
I understand you're on a tight budget, Bob, but I'm not willing to go below $1,080,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway on this one. I'm now offering the product to you for $1,070,000.
